Greetings to Turkish Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Turkish Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Hong Song Nam sent a message of greetings to Rep Tayyip Erdogan on his appointment as Prime Minister of the Republic of Turkey.
 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in keeping with the desire of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished him greater success in his responsible work for the political stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam greets Guinean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam greets Guinean President
    Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Guinean President Lansana Conte on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of the proclamation of the Second Republic in Guinea.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the president and the friendly people of guinea on this occasion.    
 Sincerely wishing the president and the people of Guinea greater success in their work for the prosperity of the country and welfare of the nation, it expressed the conviction that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Kim Won
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Kim Won
    Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il today sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Won, People's Artiste of the Korean Film Studio, expressing deep condolence over his death.
